about_the_game:
[FATAL RESEARCH]

A rail shooting FPS game based on the SCP universe.

The player is a mobile task force member of SCP and receives a unique mission for each stage.

[Stage 1]

Enter to carry out the [Full Eradication Order] after receiving news that the research team that went to investigate the strange phenomenon that appeared in an abandoned hospital was completely destroyed.

Find the cause by dealing with the victims and the research team who were turned into [mannequins] by an unknown monster!

[Stage 2]

Dispatched into space to investigate the [Space Base] that appeared in Earth's orbit

However, inside, aliens were already waging war with SCP...

A desperate chase to carry out the [Quick Search and Escape Order]!

[Stage 3]

A tunnel in a certain mountain in Japan. If left unattended, it would cause numerous casualties and contamination, so the Foundation was conducting [Regular Eradication Containment] to prevent escape to the outside.

Will the player assigned to this [Periodic Purge Quarantine] be able to complete the task safely?
